title: BUSINESS SCHOOL PREP: The ultimate guides to getting into the top MBA programs in the US
text:
You're considering getting an MBA, but you're not sure how to beat through the competition to get into one of the top business schools.

These guides will give you the inside scoop on how institutions such as Harvard, Stanford, and Wharton sift through applicants, and help you make yourself stand out.

Plus, if you're still unsure about your decision, there are also some great reads on making your decision to go back to the classroom and the books top professors are assigning to their students.

Business Insider regularly interviews MBA experts about getting into and succeeding in business school. You can read them all by subscribing to BI Prime.

Check out our guides to mapping out your MBA, from deciding whether to go back to school to figuring out which business school is right for you to getting into top institutions such as Harvard, Stanford, or Wharton.
description: These guides will give you the inside scoop on how schools such as Harvard, Stanford, and Wharton sift through applicants, and help you stand out.
